name: ian house
story: You are at Ians house. You look around and see regular house things. You are having a great day and ready to go on an adventure
nav: Press 1 to go outside, 2 to go to the attic 3 to go to the dungeon

name: outside
story: You are outside
nav: Press 1 to go to the tavern, press 2 to go to the boos room, and 3 to go to the black hole

name: attic
story: Within the attic of Ians house, you find many cobwebs and a strange portal.
nav: Press 1 to go back downstairs, 2 to go into the portal., press 3 to go to outside

name: school
story: You find yourself in your old grade school. Its ominously more quiet than you remember.
nav: Press 1 to go to the pool, press 2 to go to the library, press 3 to return go back outside

name: cave
story: You are at the cave.
nav: Press 1 to go the lake press 2 to jump down the hole

name: hole
story: You are at the bottom of the hole.
nav: Press 1 to climb back up the hole. Press 2 to walk into the dungeon p

name: tavern
story: You enter the busy tavern full of residents and travellers,
nav: press 1 to enter the black hole, press 2 to exit and enter the school outside, press 3 to enter the basement.

name: tavern basement
story: You enter the tavern's basement and stumble across assorted food items, between them you find a glowing ring.
nav: press 1 to enter the dungeon ,press 2 to enter the dungeon, press 3 to enter the spaceship.

name: black hole
story: You find yourself in your old grade school. Its ominously more quiet than you remember.
nav: press 1 to go to ians, 2 to go to outside and 3 attic

name: lake
story: the lake is filled with murky brown water
nav: press 1 to go to the cave. press 2 to go to the tavern, press 3 to go outside

name: farm
story: you are at the farm
nav: press 1 to go to the school,

name: pool
story: You are at the bottom of the pool.
nav: Press 1 to exit ,press 2 to enter the portal in the pool,press 3 to fly to Ian's house

name: Library
story: You are at the library and find a mysterious treasure map hidden inside a book that leads to the cave.
nav: Press 1 to go to the cave, Press 2 to go back to the dungeon entrance, Press 3 to go back to the library.

name: spaceship
story: You are at the spaceship
nav: press 1 to go to farm, 2 boss room, 3 is black hole

name: dungeon entrance
story: You arrive at the entrance to a dungeon. The entrance stands ominously over you as the gates slowly rise up to give way.
nav: press 1 for dungeon 1, 2 for attic, 3 for hole

name: dungeon room 1
story: You step inside the first room of the dungeon. A dim flickering light is casted onto the walls, floor, and ceiling by orange torches that line the walls of the dungeon.
nav: Press 1 to go further, 2 to go back to the entrance.

name: dungeon room 2
story: Walking down the dimly lit corridor, you find yourself at a fork.
nav: Press 1 to go right, 2 to go left, and 3 to go back.

name: dungeon room 3left
story: You walk to the left of the fork. Ahead of you is another long corridor.
nav: Press 1 to go further, 2 to go back.

name: dungeon room 3right
story: You walk to the right of the fork and are presented with a gated door.
nav: Press 1 to open the gate, 2 to go back.

name: dungeon room 4left
story: As you walk cautiously down the hallway, you find yourself at a dead end.
nav: Press 1 to go back.

name: dungeon boss room
story: You arrive in a large throne room, venerously decorated with gilded items.
nav: Press 1 to fight the boss, 2 to go back.

name: dungeon hiddenroom
story: In a completely fantastical manner, you walk through the wall at the dead end!
nav: Press 1 to explore the hidden room, 2 to go back.

name: dungeon hiddenroomexplo
story: You explore the hidden room and find a sword!
nav: Press 1 to go back.

name: dungeon bossfightinstance
story: You meet the boss and win the game!
